summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Jacadi DSR Dashboard. Backend API testing achieved 100% success rate (21/21 tests passed). Frontend UI testing successful with login flow, dashboard metrics display, tab navigation, and admin features all working properly. Minor intermittent React error observed during rapid tab switching but does not affect functionality.

integration_issues.issue: Intermittent React error during rapid tab switching (does not affect functionality)

passed_tests: Backend: Login with admin@example.com / password - SUCCESS
Backend: Health endpoint returns status ok - SUCCESS
Backend: Dashboard summary returns KPI data (revenue, transactions, ATV, locations) - SUCCESS
Backend: Retail performance returns 3 locations (Jacadi Palladium, Jacadi MOA, Shopify Webstore) - SUCCESS
Backend: Retail efficiency returns conversion metrics - SUCCESS
Backend: Whatsapp sales breakdown returns data - SUCCESS
Backend: Omni channel TM vs LM returns data - SUCCESS
Backend: Omni channel details returns data - SUCCESS
Backend: Retail omni total returns data - SUCCESS
Backend: Latest date endpoint returns date - SUCCESS
Backend: Filter endpoints (locations, brands, categories) - SUCCESS
Backend: Authorization protection working - SUCCESS
Backend: Data integrity checks passed - SUCCESS
Frontend: Login page loads with pre-filled credentials - SUCCESS
Frontend: Login redirects to dashboard - SUCCESS
Frontend: Dashboard displays 4 KPI cards (Revenue ₹59,73,700, Transactions 495, ATV ₹12,068, Active Stores 3) - SUCCESS
Frontend: Retail + Whatsapp Sales tab shows 3 locations with data - SUCCESS
Frontend: Retail + Whatsapp Sales (Conversions) tab shows efficiency metrics - SUCCESS
Frontend: Omni Channel TM vs LM tab shows growth analysis - SUCCESS
Frontend: Retail + Omni tab shows combined data - SUCCESS
Frontend: Analytics tab shows charts (Sales Trend, Channel Mix) - SUCCESS
Frontend: Sync History button opens modal with 9 successful syncs - SUCCESS
Frontend: Date filters visible and functional - SUCCESS
Frontend: Admin buttons (Manage Users, Sync History, Sync Data) visible for admin user - SUCCESS

success_rate.frontend: 95% (all major features working, minor intermittent tab switching issue)

seed_data_creation: No new seed data created - using existing MongoDB data (15204 sales transactions, 6627 footfall records, 4 users)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All backend APIs working correctly. Frontend dashboard fully functional with all 7 tabs. Sync History shows 9 successful syncs with 16,919 total rows. MongoDB migration from SQLite completed successfully. The /api/dashboards/latest-date endpoint is at /api/dashboards/latest-date (not /api/dashboards/default/latest-date).

features_verified.kpi_cards: 4 cards showing Revenue, Transactions, ATV, Active Stores with PM growth indicators
features_verified.locations: 3 locations: Jacadi Palladium, Jacadi MOA, Shopify Webstore

tabs.retail_whatsapp_sales: Working - shows sales breakdown by location
tabs.retail_whatsapp_conversions: Working - shows efficiency metrics (Conversion %, ATV, Basket Size, Multies, Footfall)
tabs.whatsapp_sale: Working - shows retail vs whatsapp share
tabs.omni_channel_tm_lm: Working - shows TM vs LM growth analysis
tabs.retail_omni: Working - shows combined retail + omni data
tabs.analytics: Working - shows charts (Sales Trend 30 Days, Channel Mix pie chart)

admin_features.sync_data: Button visible (not tested to avoid triggering actual sync)
